description: "Decentralized facilitator toolkit for the X402 protocol. Run a facilitator node anywhere, or point a gateway at multiple nodes to get a single public URL that verifies and settles payments through the network."

---

## About this project

Decentralized facilitator toolkit for the X402 protocol. Run a facilitator node anywhere, or point a gateway at multiple nodes to get a single public URL that verifies and settles payments through the network.
